## NodeRef type

Ref node - union of element/fragment tracking nodes

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type NodeRef<TElement> = ElementRef<TElement> | FragmentRef<TElement>;
```
**References:** [ElementRef](./elementref/)<!-- -->, [FragmentRef](./fragmentref/)
